Interface OrderRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Order,​java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Order,​java.lang.Integer>
public interface OrderRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Order,​java.lang.Integer>
Repository of user's orders.
Author:
Ksenia Fiodarava
